# Vault passwd Information

vault passwd path:
```sh
vault_password_file = ../vault/vault_passwd
```


# Create vault string

```sh
$ ansible-vault encrypt_string [string] >> [fileName]
$ cat [fileName]
!vault |
          $ANSIBLE_VAULT;1.1;AES256
          61316239393363616361343964336661303837633938323334343737613230363936336437636664
          6665343233633735613332336334396433323563373038340a663361653137626437386562383533
          37343761323738633430623834306338363537383134353638323762373664343838386636623039
          6130613332356661320a386264653333393337376238333539306262363462306239383361306638
          3565
Encryption successful
```
